name: Kore Innovations
description: Kore Innovations was founded in Sacramento, California in 2001.  Our vision is to make the world better by tackling real-world problems through technology.  We work with our clients to develop innovative cloud software, Software-as-a-Service platforms and mobile apps that create business growth and opportunity.  We also seed and incubate innovative new ideas and startups that we believe have the potential to impact the world in a positive way.
